structure.unit: SCHOOL EMPLOYEES -- TEACHERS' RETIREMENT AND TENURE

law.catch_line: Training program for Kentucky Virtual High School on-line coaches.
law.text: By July 1, 2009, the Kentucky Department of Education, in cooperation with teacher education institutions, shall develop a training program for certified and classified personnel to become on-line coaches to provide effective support to students enrolled in courses through the Kentucky Virtual High School.
law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 134, sec. 6, effective July 15, 2008.
